Texts.Chs: 鼠族人说这是好事，因为猿人是杀人猴子，甚至连自己的同类都能使自己变得更笨，所以可以控制。控制不好！自由的思想很重要。为什么不想要自由的思想？ 自由的思想正在使社会变得更好，社会变得更好，正在生很多孩子。生孩子是件好事。做起来也很有趣。耳廓狐非常喜欢生孩子。
Texts.Eng: Kirhos say this is good, because Apex are murder-monkeys and even poke-juice their own kind to make dumber so can control. Control is bad! Free mind matters. Why not want free-mind? Free-mind is making social better, and social better is making lots of babies. Babies are good to make. Also fun to make. Fenerox quite enjoy baby making.

Primates remind us of rock-murderers from homeworld. Remember, them always in packs and running fast and throwing things, and killing Fenerox for sport? Apex very much alike. Cruel, poking things with sharp metal sticks with juice inside. Claim doctor, but not trust because ape.
